seo: MS08-067SMB,远程命令执行漏洞,CVE-2008-4250,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测目标系统是否存在MS08-067 SMB远程命令执行漏洞（CVE-2008-4250），通过模拟攻击流程验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the target system has the MS08-067 SMB remote command execution vulnerability (CVE-2008-4250), and verifies the existence of the vulnerability by simulating the attack process.
